keypair_name.label: Paire de cles SSH - SSH Keypair
keypair_name.description: Paire de cles a injecter dans instance - Keypair to inject in instance

flavor_name.label: Type instance - Instance Type (Flavor)
flavor_name.description: Type instance a deployer - Flavor to use for the deployed instance

yaml:
!!com.cloudwatt.bss.horse.heat.descriptor.HeatDescriptor
description: All-in-one Tomcat7 stack
heat_template_version: '2013-05-23'
outputs:
  floating_ip_url:
    description: Tomcat7 URL
    value:
      str_replace:
        template: http://$floating_ip$/
        params:
          $floating_ip$:
            get_attr: [floating_ip, floating_ip_address]
parameter_groups: []
parameters:
  keypair_name:
    constraints: []
    default: null
    description: Paire de cles a injecter dans instance - Keypair to inject in instance
    hidden: false
    label: Paire de cles SSH - SSH Keypair
    type: string
  flavor_name:
    constraints:
    - allowed_values: [t1.cw.tiny, s1.cw.small-1, n1.cw.highcpu-2, n1.cw.highcpu-4,
        n1.cw.highcpu-8, n1.cw.standard-1, n1.cw.standard-2, n1.cw.standard-4, n1.cw.standard-8,
        n1.cw.standard-12, n1.cw.standard-16, n1.cw.highmem-2, n1.cw.highmem-4, n1.cw.highmem-8,
        n1.cw.highmem-12]
    default: s1.cw.small-1
    description: Type instance a deployer - Flavor to use for the deployed instance
    hidden: false
    label: Type instance - Instance Type (Flavor)
    type: string
resources:
  network:
    deletion_policy: null
    depends_on: []
    metadata: null
    properties: {}
    type: OS::Neutron::Net
    update_policy: null
  subnet:
    deletion_policy: null
    depends_on: []
    metadata: null
    properties:
      network_id: {get_resource: network}
      ip_version: 4
      cidr: 10.0.1.0/24
      allocation_pools:
      - {start: 10.0.1.100, end: 10.0.1.199}
    type: OS::Neutron::Subnet
    update_policy: null
  security_group:
    deletion_policy: null
    depends_on: []
    metadata: null
    properties:
      rules:
      - {direction: ingress, protocol: TCP, port_range_min: 22, port_range_max: 22}
      - {direction: ingress, protocol: TCP, port_range_min: 80, port_range_max: 80}
      - {direction: ingress, protocol: ICMP}
      - {direction: egress, protocol: ICMP}
      - {direction: egress, protocol: TCP}
      - {direction: egress, protocol: UDP}
    type: OS::Neutron::SecurityGroup
    update_policy: null
  floating_ip:
    deletion_policy: null
    depends_on: []
    metadata: null
    properties: {floating_network_id: 6ea98324-0f14-49f6-97c0-885d1b8dc517}
    type: OS::Neutron::FloatingIP
    update_policy: null
  server:
    deletion_policy: null
    depends_on: []
    metadata: null
    properties:
      key_name: {get_param: keypair_name}
      image: 6ca0517d-fcc3-4354-8c10-e8c6cf1ac181
      flavor: {get_param: flavor_name}
      networks:
      - network: {get_resource: network}
      security_groups:
      - {get_resource: security_group}
    type: OS::Nova::Server
    update_policy: null
  floating_ip_link:
    deletion_policy: null
    depends_on: []
    metadata: null
    properties:
      floating_ip: {get_resource: floating_ip}
      server_id: {get_resource: server}
    type: OS::Nova::FloatingIPAssociation
    update_policy: null

guiGroups.label: Generic Parameters
guiGroups.description: All remaining parameters needed for the Heat Template

attributes.name: keypair_name
attributes.description: Paire de cles a injecter dans instance - Keypair to inject in instance
attributes.label: Paire de cles SSH - SSH Keypair

attributes.name: flavor_name
attributes.description: Type instance a deployer - Flavor to use for the deployed instance
attributes.label: Type instance - Instance Type (Flavor)
